titleStmt.title: A Great and bloody plot discovered against His Royal Majesty, Charles, by the grace of God king of Great Britain, France, and Ireland. And the names of the chief actors and conspirators, who desperately threatened to wash their wicked hands in his royal blood. : With the beheading of one of the grand traytors.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Chamberlain, living near the White Swan at Holborn-bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
